name: Curtain Call (Ryder James)
description:
A platformer prototype where you control a stick puppet theatre. Many things in the environment are able to be controlled, and you just have to find the right path to the goal.

The current version is more a prototype than anything with only 4 levels, but I love the art I did for the game and overall I'd be happy to continue the project.

A/D: Move left/right; Space: Jump; Tab: Possess highlighted puppet; Q/E: Change target

Made in about 24 hours for Mini Jam 101: Limit

Credits:

All assets made by me, except:
